body.name: GOPIE Mid Tower Gaming pc case, P07 ATX Computer Chassis with Dual Chamber Panoramic Tempered Glass, High Performance Airflow-Cable Management-Support 360mm Radiator - Fans not Included -Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 6 hrs 19 mins
features: 【Dual-Chamber Panoramic Design】Gopie ATX gaming case features two pieces panoramic tempered glass design for the the ultimate display of components. Dual-chamber design separates the cables, storage and PSU from other components to maintain a clean view and maximise airflow to the GPU.

【Spacious Cooling Support】Full tower MATX case fits up to 10* 120mm cooling fans, along with multiple radiators including 360mm on top and 280mm on right. Cool down components and enhance overall performance.

【Large-space ATX full-tower case】Mini-ITX, micro-ATX, ATX, and E-ATX form factor motherboards are all supported. Fits most NVIDIA GeForce RTX 40 Series graphics cards with its 390mm max GPU clearance. Fits most standard ATX PSU with its 240mm max PSU clearance. Support 3.5" HDD *1 + 2.5" SSD *3.

【Smart I/O Panel】The equipped multifunctional I/O panel has enough ports to provide great flexibility for a variety of mobile audio accessories, includes USB 3.0 *1, Type-C *1, HD Audio, Power Switch.

【No Risk of Purchase】If you have any problems with your case, please feel free to contact us by clicking "Sold-by-GOPIE" on the page and we will do our best to help you! GOPIE strives to provide the best support for you!
Warm Tips: The components ( the fans, the motherboard, the PSU ) are not included.

GOPIE P07 Parameters Type Dual Chamber Mid Tower Gaming Case Motherboard Support E-ATX / ATX / Mini ATX / Micro ATX / ITX Case Dimensions 16.5*10.7*15.7 Inch / 420*272.5*399MM (L*W*H) Power Supply Standard ATX up to 240mm in length GPU Support Supports NVIDIA 40 series graphics cards ( up to 390mm in length ) CPU Cooler Height Max 170mm Fan Support Side : 3 * 120mm / 2 * 140mm , Top : 3*120mm / 2*140mm , Bottom : 3 * 120mm , Rear : 1 * 120mm Radiator Support Side : 120mm/240mm/280mm , Top : 120mm/240mm/280mm/360mm , Rear : 120mm Storage 1 * 3.5" HDD + 3 * 2.5" SSD Expansion Slots Max 7 PCI I/O Interfaces USB 3.0 * 1 + Type C 3.1 * 1 + HD Audio

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great case for the price
reviews.reviewText: The case has a very thoughtful design. The unconventional layout of the components made for an easy build. The system breathes very well with all of the fans. It also looks great because you can really see the lights. Another unique feature that is the first I have seen it is a platter for the SSD and HDD. I fit 3 SDD and 1 HDD on the small platter very snug. The design of the platter is quite precision and the triple plug from the EVGA gold power supply fit perfectly with no additional slack. I was surprised at the perfect fit that almost seemed too small. The drives all screw down to a platter that fits perfectly in a well ventilated compartment. Easy build with ATX mobo. No problems at all.I would not say that case is perfect because there was two very minor issues that I had with it. One of the feet did not perfeclty screw down to the case as the other 3 did. It did not cause a balance problem though and the system does not wobble when standing up. So that was no biggie. The only other gripe that I have is that one of the rivets blocked where a screw was supposed to go. That had to be improvised a bit and as a result the rubber on one of my fans was messed up a bit. The only other comment that I would mention is about the dust. The holes on the case are exceptionally large and it is covered with them. It makes for great breathing but really no good for dust inside the box. I pute some makeshift paper towel filters over the bottom holes. There supposed to be a dust screen on the bottom but the holes are way too big to stop dust even though they are smaller than all of the other holes. I also put paper towel over the top of the top mounted water cooler. I know it would inhibit cooling just a bit but the system doesn't run too hot and it's a fair trade off for preventing tons of dust from falling right through. The radiator on the cooler won't stop dust from falling in and neither would the large holed case cover.All in all, I feel that I got a good value for the money and I am very happy with the build.One final note that I really like is the fact that you can see the right side fans very well through the glass and metal side of the case. I got some nice halo fans I guess it is standard LEDs on both sides. Well from both sides they look great even through the metal side of the case.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Case is good, the fans are meh…
reviews.reviewText: I bought the model with the fans and one fan is dead, while none of them light up.The case itself is dope! Easy to work on, lots of air flow, and the two glass panels make it look great inside.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very great case omg so pretty only complaint is instructions for connecting the fans n the fan wires were messy originally but that's fixable if u know what ur doing lol great tho

reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The case is okay
reviews.reviewText: The case is okay but the hooks for the glass and the back case are very weak they pop off easily and dont stay on

reviews.reviewText: Buen producto pero vino con una muy muy pequeña desviacion en una de las placas del chasis, bien puedo ser el viaje.
